Comments_List: Improved reading in Spanish and translation from Spanish to English.
I learned how to read and understand Spanish. I feel confident that I could work through an archive now in a way that I couldnt before I started.
This class could be easily compete by someone with no previous Spanish experience.
It serves its purpose well, you do lots of translating. I imagine this course would be pretty tough if you have never taken any spanish before. Also it can be a bit boring sometimes.

The course is incredibly engaging and Pilar is highly effective at injecting enthusiasm into the class. The translation assignments especially let students bring their passions into the class to share with each other.
Yes I would definitely recommend if you want to brush up on Spanish (but will be very easy for anyone with prior Spanish experience) or learn to read Spanish. Would make an excellent 5th class.
Yes. Its a good refresher if you have taken spanish before and its also easy.
This course is excellent for those who need to do archival work or other written translation.
